name: Max Payne: Kung Fu 3.0
summary:
Kung Fu is a top-of-the-line kung-fu modification for Max Payne. It included a new training map, improved acrobatic skills, and a kung fu fighting system.
Some of the new features include: new "kung fu style" flips and spins, wall running and wall jumping, two additional gunshot dodging techniques, and improved impact physics that allows for juggling bodies and throwing them into walls and other enemies, - a hand-to-hand fighting mode and a stick fighting mode, a Kung Fu skill level system and a complex combo attack system.
